snippet: The Museum of Reclaimed Urban Space will, among other things, tell the story of those who transformed abandoned properties into permanent housing or community gardens.
abstract: Museum of Reclaimed Urban Space in Manhattan's East Village will, among other things, tell the story of those who transformed abandoned properties that had been taken over by squatters into permanent housing or community gardens.
lead_paragraph: The Museum of Reclaimed Urban Space will, among other things, tell the story of those who transformed abandoned properties into permanent housing or community gardens.

headline.seo: East Village Museum Shares a Piece of Activist History
headline.main: Sharing a Part of Activist History in the East Village
headline.print_headline: Sharing a Part of Activist History in the East Village
